website_summaries.verdict: This affordable rod is good for occasional, casual fishing.
pros: Chrome guides with a graphite reel seat and stainless steel cushioned hoods
Cork handle and top-notch ultralight action
Fiberglass rod blank, a 2-ball bearing drive
cons: You get what you pay for as it's not the most durable reed

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable value.  Great first rod or replacement rod that does not break the bank...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I m not sure you can find a better combo. Rod: 2 piece, ultra light action. Perfect for poppers, flies and bugs. Should be able to handle a nice sized bass or crappie. Real cork grip. Reel: Convertible left/right. Smooth action, non-reversing switch. Light action with a smooth silky spin. Drag works well. Overall : If you're looking for a 2 piece travel rod, or a new "old friend" to take to the lake, you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: dc-in-md

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable and light rod and spinning combo
customer_reviews.text: I used for stream trout fishing for weeks. It is great. It was in water while I was landing the fish. It works well, no rust, smooth. I liked it very much. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jelart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little rod
customer_reviews.text: Great little fishing rod at a decent price! My boyfriend taught me how to fish and was kind of jealous of this rod because it was nicer than the one he picked up at Walmart. The cork handle is a nice touch and it was perfect for catching rainbow trout.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set up...we have a purchased 2 over the last few months. Great for lures up to about 1/4 ounce. It got a test against some really nice trout and smallmouth and held up well. Was really impressed for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with these little combos, just what I expected!!! Look forward to getting this line wet. Well after giving this pair of rods and reels a little workout I discovered a couple flaws and had to do a little mechanic work on each of my reels. It was also a drag, finding the same rod and reel combo with a different name on them for a dollar less at that one mart that shall not be named. The cheaper combo even came pre spooled with line. Hmmmm
customer_reviews.author: joshua stockford

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This present was for my nephew and he really loves whatever his aunt buys for him but the first rod came with half of a rod and the reorder was not the same rod not even a microlite. He is happy but I am terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MOD

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale. I wanted another ultralight set for back up in case my regular one got damaged while I was on a trip. This one works well. I put 4 lbs. test camo fishing line on it. It can cast 1/16 oz. jigs really easy. Works great for drop shot fishing. I use it for smallmouth bass in the Adirondacks.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted reel!
customer_reviews.text: This combo is absolute garbage! First day out on Millinockett stream and the reel busted on the third fish. What should have been a great day ended in disappoint due soley to the lack of craftsmanship in the reel. I have ordered a replacement trout stick from elsewhere! Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Ermino Magno

customer_reviews.title: but excellent item for the money
customer_reviews.text: considering the low costs, this is a superb small outfit....works flawlessly....
customer_reviews.author: Helen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the price u cant beat it. Fished it a good amount of ti.es and caught some good bass n bluegill and is still holding up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ultra-lite for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great ultralite rod. 4th one. Length Perfect for fishing under bridges for crappie.
customer_reviews.author: Dd

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I think this will be a great pole/real for the money. I haven't had the chance to use the pole yet.
customer_reviews.author: crackshot

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rod and reel combo. Very light and sturdy. Catching lots of panfish with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patarooski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, reel and rod. Rod handle actually cork. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight reel combo.  I catch tons of fish with the rod and reel.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product as it is light tackle and the length is great for fishing anytime. Test range is 2 - 6 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Rt1986

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 of these rods and it’s by far the best rods I have
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bougt 2 of these rods and it’s by far the best rods I have , great price
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I had to buy a second one. Works great for panfish and trout.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Cavener

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rod and reel. I've caught fish of all sizes on it, and it holds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Vinson

customer_reviews.title: go to a sporting goods store see whst you buy
customer_reviews.text: i'm sorry i purchased this rod and reel combo for my grandson it would be ok for small blue gill the reel is awful really cheap i won't send it back will just mark it up as a bad investment the old saying you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Ed B.

customer_reviews.title: Great rod poor reel
customer_reviews.text: Rod is great for the bargain but the rod came with loose internerals that required tightening.
customer_reviews.author: anlay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: They did right by me... excellent customer service and made a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rod and reel at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice combo. Excellent seller.
customer_reviews.text: Fastest shipping ever. This seller is awesome. It must have shipped the instant I ordered. The rod and reel combo is great too. Feels like quality, rod is finished well, the real is smooth and feels good casting. Very pleased with this entire purchase experience. Highly recommended if you are needing a quality ultralite combo.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mullins

customer_reviews.title: The pole alone is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of the reel. But this is my favorite pole I own by far. I’ve owned variations for years I own 3 or 4 they used to make them blue now they’re green. They’ve never let me down. The reels are fine and functional I’m just a bit of a reel snob and have a thing for higher ball bearing counts and in general pflueger reels. I have one with a pflueger president and one with a Trion. My go to trout and small bass poles. I take them to Canada every time I visit and I spool them with suffix 4lb mono about every year or two. Fantastic poles.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Impressive value for the money...
customer_reviews.text: Note: I paid $19 at Wallyworld for this exact rod & reel combo. Used it to fish for pond bass and it worked amazingly well... reel seems of very high quality - smooth and effective. I prefer the small size, and realize it'd be good for trout fly fishing in the local river. It is, of course, made in China... but, again, for the money... I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: StephLadder

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set up for my son's 14 th birthday went fishing the next day and he landed a 4 pound bass and loved the pole it handled it with eaze,the pole is tough and reliable how ever do to grandpa's negligence he casted the hook on a tree limb and put to much strain on the reel and broke the reel but other then that incident, it's a great little light pole would recommend buying a better reel ,I am a frequent reviewer on u tube , of fishing, and camping equipment this is a bang for your buck plus eye pleasing color of the set up would recommend stay safe and God bless
customer_reviews.author: Jesus.Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent! Buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this combo for Texas trout fishing. The first time I used it the reel locks up and won’t turn! The reel spool looks unbalanced and loose, bent and will not turn! Very frustrating with a brand new rod! Price was cheap and so is the South Bend Microlite reel quality. The rod works great but I’ll go purchase a better quality reel to use with it! No more South Bend for me!
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: 24" striper to pan fish, it can do it all.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this rod for everything (salt and fresh water) and it has been a blast. I've caught trout, largemouth, and panfish as well as porgy, black fish, black sea bass, bluefish, and striped bass. Largest fish was a 24" striper, this rod is a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Lue Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great small trout rod
customer_reviews.text: I fish a small stream for trout every day and this rod and reel do work!
customer_reviews.author: steven anderson

product_meta.title: South Bend ML210/502UL MCR Lt 5' Ul Sp Combo 2Pc
product_meta.description: Microlite is a Panfish performer - or is it a challenging Bass bandit? Complete with cork handle, ultralight action and 2 ball bearing reel with aluminum spool.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel cushioned hoods; Cork handle
Reel size: 10 Bearings: 2 Rod size: 5' Pieces: 2 Line weight: 2-6 lbs. Lure weight: 1/16 - 1/4 oz.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
